item.name: Omelette
item.description: A classic omelette made with three eggs and your choice of cheese and vegetables.

item.name: Pancakes
item.description: A stack of fluffy pancakes served with butter and maple syrup.

item.name: Eggs Benedict
item.description: A classic brunch dish with poached eggs, Canadian bacon, and hollandaise sauce on an English muffin.

item.name: Fried Calamari
item.description: Crispy fried calamari rings served with a spicy marinara sauce.

item.name: Nachos
item.description: Crispy tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapenos, and your choice of beef or chicken.

item.name: Cheese Dip
item.description: A creamy cheese dip served with warm tortilla chips.

item.name: Sandwich
item.description: Your choice of turkey, ham, or roast beef with lettuce, tomato, and mayo on your choice of bread.

item.name: Steak
item.description: A juicy grilled steak served with roasted potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

item.name: Beef Stew
item.description: A hearty stew made with tender chunks of beef, carrots, potatoes, and onions.
